page.title: 16Ponds In Woodchurch
page.content: Some ponds are natural.Most of the ponds in Woodchurch are man made.Some were made as a source of water for the village .Farmers built ponds for their livestock so they had lots of water for them to drink.On large estates ponds were used for decoration.Some ponds are fed by natural springs which come up cracks in the Earth and keep the water level up.Springs are usually in valleys and not on top of hills.Weeds ,insects , birds and fish couldn't survive without the pond.There are lots of different types of weeds and insects.We found waterboatman , pondskaters and water spider.There are waterweeds,fungus, and water lilies in the ponds.Fish like tench , roach and rudd live in some of the ponds.{
